'''Mike Till''' is a former [[Mojang Studios]] customer support agent who worked with [[Marc Watson]] at their previous customer service job. When it became clear that more support staff would be needed, Marc requested that Mike be brought on. Mike is a gamer, and formerly of the US Army.<ref>{{reddit|s6c46/i_am_marc_watson_customer_support_manager_of|c4bgd4a|I would bring Mike (sorry Aron!). He's former military, and could probably keep us alive.|Marc_IRL|April 12, 2012}}</ref>
